data.name: CI/CD Pipeline Automation
data.description: Automated CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions to streamline deployment processes and improve development efficiency.

data.name: Infrastructure as Code with Terraform
data.description: Used Terraform to automate the provisioning of cloud infrastructure on AWS, ensuring consistency and reducing manual errors.

data.name: Dockerized Microservices
data.description: Developed and deployed a microservices architecture using Docker, improving scalability and maintainability of applications.

data.name: Kubernetes Cluster Management
data.description: Managed Kubernetes clusters for application deployment, ensuring high availability and efficient resource utilization.

data.name: Monitoring and Logging with ELK Stack
data.description: Implemented monitoring solutions using the ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana) to track application performance and logs.

data.name: Automated Security Testing
data.description: Created automated security testing scripts using tools like Snyk and Checkmarx to ensure secure code practices in CI/CD pipelines.
